example: Industry developed near the Great Lakes in the 19th century.
Ships could carry raw materials across the lakes.
Ford used an assembly line to make many cars quickly.
Pittsburgh became the center of the steel industry.

kana: せんたんぎじゅつさんぎょう
example: The high-tech industry grew in an area called Silicon Valley.

kana: こうくううちゅうさんぎょう
example: The aerospace industry is important for modern defense and travel.
Biotechnology is a key field in modern scientific research.
The center of industry moved to the Sunbelt in the south.
They took land from indigenous people and built towns.
One major problem in the US is the large economic difference.
